# How to render the 3d Viewport (the easy way)?

- In this way you cannot change the color or any style of the wireframes...

## Viewport options

- This little icons lets you toggle on and off the options (e.g. you can turn off all the gridlines)

![](images/vpoptions.png)
- When you select all vertices under `Select -> All` in Object mode they should become orange

- Then under `View -> Viewport Render Image` you can render the current  Viewport
